txt.en: TBD
The statue is at the after-battle Cross-roads.\n\nYou should break the defiled head upon the Statue of the Fallen King.

'Yes, I am Arandol. As you can see, the repairs are behind schedule. Orcs have defiled the statue, removed the head, and scrawled unintelligible markings all over it.\n\n'First those Orkish poles will need to be removed, then that vile head must come down. If you are able, the statue's original head should be retrieved and placed back atop its shoulders.

Suitable stone can be found in and around Osgiliath. Suitable water can be found along the Anduin in Osgiliath.\n\nYou should collect some stone for mending the statues of the Fallen King and water for washing away the scrawls and filth.
Talk to Arandol
TBD can be found at the Cross-roads.\n\nYou should speak with TBD.
Break the defiled statue head
Collect suitable stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Angbor at the Cross-roads
You should talk to Arandol, who can be found by the statue at the after-battle Cross-roads.

The statue is at the after-battle Cross-roads.\n\nYou should remove the Orkish poles placed around the Statue of the Fallen King.
With the Host of the West on the march, Angbor has been given orders to mend the Statue of the Fallen King.
Clean the scrawls and filth from off the statue
The statue is at the after-battle Cross-roads.\n\nYou should retrieve the original head of the Statue of the Fallen King.
The statue of the Fallen King is at the Cross-roads.\n\nYou should clean the statue.

You should talk to Arandol, who can be found at the after-battle Cross-roads.
The statue is at the after-battle Cross-roads.\n\nYou should place the original head upon the Statue of the Fallen King.

The statue finally shines after many years of neglect and vandalism
Collected suitable water ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Removed Orkish pole ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Angbor can be found at the Cross-roads.\n\nYou should speak with Angbor.
'You completed all those tasks? One alone would have put us ahead of schedule! Perhaps we shall be allowed to march on from this place, thanks to you!'
TBD
'When you are able, speak with Arandol near the Statue of the Fallen King. He is in charge of the statue repairs and will be able to put you to work in assisting our efforts here.'
The Fallen King in Ruin
